function GachaAnimation(characterName, spriteName)
  -- 暗転
  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

  local layerName = characterName
  local bgSpriteName = spriteName
  local bgLayer = 100
  local charaLayer = 50
  local charaEffectLayer1 = 55
  local charaEffectLayer2 = 60
  local animeScaleTime = 300
  local animeAlphaTime = 300
  local scale = 300
  local animeDelayTime = animeScaleTime / 5

  -- 白背景
  LAYER_LOAD(bgLayer, "BG000ab")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask027",500,false)
  WAIT(animeDelayTime)
  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,bgSpriteName)
  LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(bgLayer,0,animeAlphaTime,Ease.InSine)

  -- ガチャの音ならす

  -- 1人目登場
  LAYER_LOAD(charaLayer, layerName)
  LAYER_SCALE(charaLayer,scale,scale)
  LAYER_ALPHA(charaLayer,0)
  LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(charaLayer,255,animeAlphaTime,Ease.InSine)
  LAYER_MOVE_SCALE(charaLayer,100,100,animeScaleTime,Ease.InSine)

  -- 2人目登場
  LAYER_LOAD(charaEffectLayer1, layerName)
  LAYER_EFFECT(charaEffectLayer1,4)
  LAYER_ALPHA(charaEffectLayer1,200)
  LAYER_SCALE(charaEffectLayer1,scale,scale)
  LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(charaEffectLayer1,100,animeAlphaTime * 1.25,Ease.InSine)
  LAYER_MOVE_SCALE(charaEffectLayer1,100,100,animeScaleTime * 1.25,Ease.InSine)

  -- 3人目登場
  LAYER_LOAD(charaEffectLayer2, layerName)
  LAYER_EFFECT(charaEffectLayer2,4)
  LAYER_SCALE(charaEffectLayer2,scale,scale)
  LAYER_ALPHA(charaEffectLayer2,200)
  LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(charaEffectLayer2,100,animeAlphaTime * 1.5,Ease.InSine)
  LAYER_MOVE_SCALE(charaEffectLayer2,100,100,animeScaleTime * 1.5,Ease.InSine)

  WAIT(animeAlphaTime * 1.5)

  -- 3人目消滅
  LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(charaEffectLayer2,0,animeAlphaTime * 1.5,Ease.InSine)
  LAYER_MOVE_SCALE(charaEffectLayer2,scale * 2,scale * 2,animeScaleTime * 1.5,Ease.InSine)

  -- 2人目消滅
  LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(charaEffectLayer1,0,animeAlphaTime * 1.75,Ease.InSine)
  LAYER_MOVE_SCALE(charaEffectLayer1,scale,scale,animeScaleTime * 1.75,Ease.InSine)

  -- 音ならす

  PLAY_SE("SEb013.wav")
  WAIT(animeScaleTime * 2)

  -- レイヤー破棄
  LAYER_LOAD(charaEffectLayer1 , "")
  LAYER_LOAD(charaEffectLayer2 , "")
end

  -- 2人目消滅
  LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(charaEffectLayer1,0,animeAlphaTime * 1.75,Ease.InSine)
  LAYER_MOVE_SCALE(charaEffectLayer1,scale,scale,animeScaleTime * 1.75,Ease.InSine)

  -- 音ならす

  PLAY_SE("SEb013.wav")
  WAIT(animeScaleTime * 2)

  -- レイヤー破棄
  LAYER_LOAD(charaEffectLayer1 , "")
  LAYER_LOAD(charaEffectLayer2 , "")
end
